fileManipulation
Class openSave

java.lang.Object
  fileManipulation.openSave

public class openSave
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
John Bannister provides static methods to open and save files used by recoverImage and createImage and the Image objects

openImage

public static byte[] openImage(java.io.File fileName)
                        throws java.io.IOException
reads an image file into an array of bytes borrows liberally from: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/io/DataInputStream.html

Parameters:
fileName - the bitmap file to open
Returns:
each binary byte in the image as an array
